name: TET9
description:
What it is:

This demo game - is part of my student project.  It is featuring hide-and-seek game in 3d powered by non-standard pathfinding. I would like YOUR review for my student paper! (Notice, i will hide all the bad words with  "!?#¯\_(ツ)_/¯#?!" sequence and it will look funny if I print it.

This is my first game and my first time I am using Unity and C#.

All the visuals and programming are made solely by me, (and tons of great tutorials on youtube I have followed). Only font is not mine - it's "Pixel" from 1001fonts.

Thank you!
